articles.author: Peter Fabricius
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: Former Russian military officer says Ukraine conflict will only get worse — for Russia - Daily Maverick
articles.description: One of Russia’s top defence commentators, a former military officer, has warned his country to brace itself for an ever harder war against a resurgent force of one million well-armed and highly motivated Ukrainians.
articles.content: Almost all the Russian pundit commentary has been obsequious, presenting the war in Ukraine as going well. But in a very rare moment of brutal candour on Russian state TV this week, former colonel Mi… [+7578 chars]
